name: deleteDeployment
description: This API allows you to delete a deployment, either by supplying its `id` in the URL or the `url` of the deployment as a query parameter. You can obtain the ID, for example, by listing all deployments.

id.description: The ID of the deployment to be deleted

url.description: A Deployment or Alias URL. In case it is passed, the ID will be ignored

teamId.description: The Team identifier or slug to perform the request on behalf of.

$ul: **state**: A constant with the final state of the deployment.
